rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0001
rows.name:
*gasp* So, this is the mighty
Saffronia tree?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0002
rows.name:
There aren't many trees with red
blossoms... Woowee! That's a real
humdinger. Yup, it's pretty.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0003
rows.name: Oh, hey, by the way...

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0004
rows.name:
You hear lots of legends about big trees
like this, right? Like, if you confess your
love underneath them, it'll come true?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0005
rows.name:
Yeah. I've heard that kind of
gumph before too.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0006
rows.name:
Right? But if you ask me, it's probably
a load of old nonsense.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0007
rows.name:
I mean, if it was that easy to find
true love, the whole world would
be full of nothing but happy folks.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0008
rows.name:
You seem very convinced, but have
you ever tested your hypothesis?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0009
rows.name:
What, me, making confessions of love?
I mean, if we're gonna talk about that,
how about you, Kagutsuchi?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0010
rows.name:
You seem the sincere, passionate type.
Have you ever made a confession
of love to anyone?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0011
rows.name: Me? Of course not.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0012
rows.name: How about you, Homura?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0013
rows.name:
Huh?
Me?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0014
rows.name:
Oh, but of course, silly me.
You've already got your special
someone, haven't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0015
rows.name:
Huh? What do you mean,
I've already...?!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0016
rows.name:
And the same goes for you
Saika, of course.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0017
rows.name: Well...I'm not gonna say you're wrong.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0018
rows.name:
As for you, Hana...I guess you're
still a bit young to be thinking about
that kind of thing.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0019
rows.name:
Hana not born yesterday. But not
much more long ago than yesterday.
So not really understand.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0020
rows.name:
Yeah, you probably just need to get
a little bit bigger before this kind of
thing makes sense to you.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0021
rows.name: So, how about you, Driver?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0022
rows.name: Ah... What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0023
rows.name:
Just let me take in this scenery, will
you?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0024
rows.name: I'll confess my love right now!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0025
rows.name: Ah... What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0026
rows.name:
Hey, just let me look at this view, will
you?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0027
rows.name:
You want a confession of love?
I'll give you one right now!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0028
rows.name: Ah... What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0029
rows.name: Quiet. Let me enjoy the view.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0030
rows.name: Allow me to confess my love right now!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0031
rows.name: Ah... What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0032
rows.name:
Hey, I need to get some inspiration
from this view here.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0033
rows.name:
Heck, why not. I'll confess my
love right here and now!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0101
rows.name: Uh? What?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0102
rows.name:
How long do you need to look at it?
One look lasts a lifetime, you know.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0103
rows.name:
Zakuro... Don't you think a little peace
and quiet is important to really absorb
the beauty of nature?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0104
rows.name:
Nah, not so much. I feel like I've got it
all packed away in the brain-box
already.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0105
rows.name:
But anyhow. Is anyone else getting
peckish for something sweet?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0106
rows.name:
Hey, Homura! Why don't we slink away
somewhere and get a Blossom Custard
or something?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0107
rows.name:
I hear that's one of the must-try things
here in Invidia.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0108
rows.name:
Well, you know me. I'm happy
as long as everyone else is.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0109
rows.name:
I'm not too sure what it is about this
situation that's making you hungry
exactly.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0110
rows.name:
I think Zakuro just prefers the practical
to the aesthetic.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0111
rows.name:
The what to the what? Those were
some fancy words there, Kagutsuchi.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0112
rows.name:
When I see something pretty, I get
hungry, that's all. Doesn't everyone?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0113
rows.name:
Maybe it's just a phase I'm going
through. Something to do with my
biorhythms.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0114
rows.name:
Zakuro, I think you might be
overthinking this somewhat.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0115
rows.name:
But, I mean, it makes a lot of sense. A
young girl's desire is a force of nature.
It knows no limits!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0116
rows.name:
It's all that boundless energy that gives
us our appeal. You should remember
that, Hana.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0117
rows.name:
Looks like being a girl is quite complex.
Hana will study hard to be girl
effectively.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0201
rows.name:
Huh?
R-right now?!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0202
rows.name:
W-wow, this is a little embarrassing...
Er, I don't know what to say...

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0203
rows.name: Now-now I'm getting all nervous!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0204
rows.name:
Zakuro getting ahead of herself.
Confession of love not necessarily
for Zakuro.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0205
rows.name: True enough. It could be for me.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0206
rows.name: Or for me!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0207
rows.name: Don't count me outta the running!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0208
rows.name:
Seems like there's a healthy
rivalry brewing here!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0209
rows.name:
Come on, Driver! It's time you told us
exactly who it is you've got a special
soft spot for!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0210
rows.name:
U-um, guys?
I was just joking...

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0211
rows.name:
Oh, for the... I was kidding, obviously!
Can't you take a joke?!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0212
rows.name:
Actually, I was only trying to lighten
the mood. Was my humor too subtle?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0213
rows.name:
Oh, come off it, ladies.
Isn't it obvious I was joking around?

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0214
rows.name:
Just a joke? Aw, and there I was
getting all excited...

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0215
rows.name: I honestly thought it was serious...

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0216
rows.name:
Oh Homura... You're so sweet and gullible.
I was just playing along, of course.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0217
rows.name:
Hana's sensors detected distinct
rise in heart rate of Kagutsuchi.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0218
rows.name: Ah...um...

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0219
rows.name:
Hey, maybe this isn't the best place to
talk about all this stuff. Let's get into it
back in the girl's room at the inn.

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0220
rows.name:
This one'll be strictly for us girl Blades.
No Drivers. It's Bladies' Night!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0221
rows.name:
We'll get a few sweet treats and just
natter till the sun comes up. Ooh, I
can't wait!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0222
rows.name:
Hana can join in while charging
battery. Good opportunity for Hana's
psychological development!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0223
rows.name:
Some of it could be a little
advanced for you, Hana.
Even I might struggle to keep up!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0224
rows.name: Indeed...

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0225
rows.name: I think I'll let Hikari-chan handle this one...

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0226
rows.name:
Ooh! I'm so excited, I could just burst!
Like, literally!

rows.label: kizunatalk067_msg0227
rows.name:
But, hey, don't worry. It's not like we're
doing this just so we can trash-talk
Drivers.
